rejected.subject: CS160 ABSENCE NOT EXCUSED
rejected.body:
Dear {Student},

We hope this email finds you well. Your absence request for {Date} has been denied. Please reach out to cs160@berkeley.edu if you have any further questions or concerns.

Best,
CS 160 Staff

approved.subject: CS160 ABSENCE EXCUSED
approved.body:
Dear {Student}.

We hope this email finds you well. This is an email confirmation that your absence on {Date} for {Event} has been excused.

Best,
CS160 staff
